yellow rubber duck named Murphy nearby
dark hoodie with company logo, eager expression

global_style.style: Render a Modern Graphic Novel with sharp, crisp details; absolutely no motion blur. Text & Speech Bubbles: Speech bubbles must not touch or overlap panel edges. Bubble tails must clearly point to the speaking character’s face. All text must be highly visible and Accurate, using clean sans-serif comic lettering with at least 5px padding inside bubbles. Characters (all must appear together in the same environment)
global_style.line_style: Bold, clean ink outlines with slight thicktothin variation for depth. Shading : Minimal cross-hatching mainly soft cel shading plus subtle halftone dots in shadow areas.

panels.scene_description: Operations room daylight. Mei points at a deploy feed on screen while rookie Alex holds a sticky-note with the 5-Question Drill. Dashboards show a fresh v2.4.0 label.

speech_bubbles.mei: First habit: track every deploy before you touch an alert.

panels.learning_objective: Show learners the cornerstone habit of checking recent changes.
panels.takeaway: Know what shipped—it's the quickest breadcrumb to root cause.

panels.scene_description: Evening. Mei and JC high-five in front of a CI dashboard that just pushed a Jsonnet RED template. A pull-request diff and a Grafana screenshot appear as holographic overlays.

speech_bubbles.jc: Template merged—every service gets an instant RED board!

panels.learning_objective: Emphasize turning manual habits into CI-driven templates.
panels.takeaway: Dashboards in Git prevent silent drift and accelerate reviews.

panels.scene_description: Night shift. Mei watches a self-healing metrics panel: attempts, successes, and a green 'Chaos Drill Passed' badge. A Gremlin icon fades while Murphy sports a tiny helmet.

speech_bubbles.mei: If recovery is slower than your pipeline, automate faster.

panels.learning_objective: Introduce self-healing and chaos validation as top-tier SRE goals.
panels.takeaway: Design systems that recover themselves—then prove it with chaos.
